nodes.text: Everything You Always Wanted to Know about the Nightsisters but Were Afraid to Ask

"Everything You Always Wanted to Know about the Nightsisters but Were Afraid to Ask" is an article written by Leland Chee that appeared in Star Wars Insider 122. The article delves into the history of the Nightsisters, and their continued appearances throughout the Expanded Universe. Chee also explains the new additions of the Nightbrothers and Asajj Ventress' new history with the planet Dathomir in regards to the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series. This article was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014.
The article referred to a picture of Tenel Ka and mistook it for Kirana Ti.
